channel.title: tongue twisters on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in tongue twisters on Rusland 1

item.title: Tongue Twisters (2/2): Tricky Sentences and Speed Tests
item.description: Twisting Words The tongue twister in Russian is called скороговоркa (plural скороговорки) and in English, a tongue-twister . For the first part , we dealt with big words (see shibboleth ), but with tricky sentences, we’re getting closer to potential accidents.

item.title: Tongue Twisters (1/2): Long Words and Pronunciation Practice Materials
item.description: Difficult words This is straightforward: see for yourself if these are hard. The Hardest Russian Words to Pronounce (Russian with Tatiana, 2019, 7 m) Pronouncing Hardest Russian Words (Living Life With The Shirins, 2019, 11 m) 10 Most Difficult Russian Words (Russian with Nastya, 2019, 6 m), from the same channel: 10 Russian Words That You Pronounce Incorrectly (2019, 5 m) The 10 Hardest Russian Words to Pronounce (Tsar Experience, 2018, 6 m) The 10 Hardest Russian Words to Pronounce (Conor Clyne, 2018, 6 m) Learn the Top 10 Hardest Russian Words to Pronounce (RussianPod101, 2015, 5 m) Long words Russian words are, on average, just a bit longer than Dutch ones.
